I don't like kids either. Well, that isn't actually true â€“ I like kids just fine. It's having to navigate through areas that have a large number of children that I have a problem with. Mainly, because they love to creep around just outside of your field of view and give absolutely no indication that they are there, but the exact second you knock one down and make them cry, it's instantly your fault, even if you had no idea they were even there.

All of this for a fuckin' camera nub.

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e557636872481db60000#post_5400e557636872481db60000

Man, just when Nintendo was starting to look good again, they pull this bullshit. 

Again, if it was a slightly better system, there'd be no problem. But the exclusive game BS pisses me off. _Multiple exclusive games._

Oh, and the worst part? That little nub of a button on the new model controls the release of a final smash on the new Smash Bros for 3ds. Which means that there's a chance that you will only be able to play that game on the new system. I'm hoping I'm wrong.

[spoiler]That's a FFVII joke, for the record.[/spoiler]
